body.text: Inverse is a media and entertainment site dedicated to sparking curiosity about the future.
For three years, I've worked with a small but all-star engineering team to build infrastructure that handles tens of millions of pageviews every month without breaking a sweat.

My role as a backend engineer at Inverse has specifically oriented me toward developing and maintaining a sophisticated data pipeline system, innovating on new strategies to test new features against broad business KPIs, and learning more about email newsletters than youâ€™d ever think there was to know.
I love designing watches, and visual design generally. Here's one I designed recently, inspired by a trip to Naples, Florida.
My 2019 New Year's Resolution is to actually make one.
